pages.title: Player Detector
pages.text: $(italic)You know people who build gigantic constructions out of redstone just to open an oversized door. And then they trigger it with an unsightly pressure plate.$(br)The Player Detector, on the other hand, is able to sense your presence - or that of other players - at a distance and sends out a corresponding redstone signal.$(br)Much better.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Range: 10 blocks.$(br)Emits a full strength signal, if the player who placed it is detected, otherwise 8.
